name: Handpainted Tunic "Window of Morocco"
description:
Artistic Details:
* Design photograph "Window of Morocco" taken at the ancient medina of Fez (UNESCO World Heritage Site) 
* Photograph © Yuliana Candra for BlacMéra

Product Details:
* Handpainted by artisan 
* Fabrics: Dolce & Gabbana Italian silk chiffon
* Inspired by Moroccan Kaftan
* Length: 36"/90cm
* Dry clean only
* Product ID: TNC001

Please note:
* There will be slight coloring variation (within 10%) due to the handpainting process. Each piece is crafted by hand, therefore there is no two pieces truly alike in each brush stroke.
* 2-3 weeks processing time
